detailsSection: This whitepaper highlights the broad range of hardware supported by Microsoft® Office 2010 and describes the significant improvements in performance available in Office 2010.  Results from internal testing by Microsoft are included to demonstrate the measurable performance gains users can experience when performing common tasks using different Office 2010 applications.  These results indicate that in some cases uses can expect performance gains of 90% or higher compared with using corresponding Office 2007 applications.

installInstructionSection: Download the documents individually or the entire pack.  Read and provide this white paper within your organization for a more comprehensive understanding of the performance and hardware investments "under the hood" in Office 2010.
